summary: A small mod that adds some map markers to key areas within the Forgotten Vale.
descriptionHtml:
This is my first mod that I made just because I felt that the Vale lacked easy transport to certain areas. Plus, the Vale marker itself can teleport, making it harder to get places.

This mod simply adds some map markers to key areas located within the Vale, such as the Paragon Portal, the Glacial Crevice and so on.

[b]Requirements[/b]
* Dawnguard MUST be installed and enabled!

[b]Install Instructions[/b]
This mod can either be added through a mod manager, or just copy/pasting the lone ESP file to /steamapps/common/Skyrim/Data

Please endorse if you find this useful! :D
author: Super Sajuuk
